Description.Text:
Royal Regency Hotel is conveniently located in the Flamengo District within walking distance of Flamengo Beach. Catete metro station is 500 mts away and Santos Dumont Aiport is 3 kms away, while Copacabana Beach is just 5 kms away.
Each room is modernly furnished and offer Satellite Tv, air conditioning and a mini bar. Other services include an outdoor pool and a sun Terrace.
